titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Majesty. Most gracious soveraign, the glorious Lord of heaven and earth hath done so great things for us in restoring your Majesty to your throne, ...
titleStmt.author: Winchester, John Paulet, Earl of, 1598-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston at the Angel in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed at end: John Lord Paulet [and 94 others].
A congratulatory notice to Charles II.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
